医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为期 18 个月的冥想计划可改善老年人的心理健康由伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 联合领导的国际团队进行的一项新的随机对照试验发现，经过 18 个月的冥想计划可以改善老年人的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/18-month-meditation-program-improves-psychological-wellbeing-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/18-month-meditation-program-improves-psychological-wellbeing-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=678dee3f-26a8-40f7-bd78-897a3418fdbd Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:48:20 -0500 18-month meditation program improves psychological wellbeing in seniors
不良的童年经历可能会增加年轻人肌肉畸形的几率发表在《临床社会工作杂志》上的一项新研究发现，在 18 岁之前经历过不良童年经历 (ACE) 的青少年和年轻人明显更有可能出现肌肉畸形症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Adverse-childhood-experiences-may-increase-the-odds-of-muscle-dysmorphia-in-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Adverse-childhood-experiences-may-increase-the-odds-of-muscle-dysmorphia-in-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235685fe-9dd9-4fb0-8dd3-9506901dad8e Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:25:28 -0500 Adverse childhood experiences may increase the odds of muscle dysmorphia in young people
脑肽被认为是酗酒的关键因素酒精是世界上最常见的成瘾物质。在美国，过度饮酒每年造成 2,490 亿美元的损失，并导致约 88,000 人死亡，以及各种慢性疾病和社会问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Brain-peptide-identified-as-key-player-in-heavy-alcohol-drinking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Brain-peptide-identified-as-key-player-in-heavy-alcohol-drinking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da6aeb59-5587-45d0-9881-1605c66cf037 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 14:12:04 -0500 Brain peptide identified as key player in heavy alcohol drinking
研究发现关键前列腺癌治疗的利用存在种族差异加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与其他种族和族裔群体（包括白人或拉丁裔男性）相比，被诊断出患有晚期前列腺癌的黑人男性接受新型激素治疗的可能性明显较低治疗已被证明可以有效控制前列腺肿瘤的生长并延长患有该疾病的男性的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-finds-racial-disparity-in-the-utilization-of-crucial-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Study-finds-racial-disparity-in-the-utilization-of-crucial-prostate-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42809a34-fa63-4165-933e-75b4fc89cba0 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 13:51:33 -0500 Study finds racial disparity in the utilization of crucial prostate cancer therapy
DUHS 被评为使用数字医疗技术的顶级医疗保健组织杜克大学医疗系统因其利用技术改善患者安全和治疗结果而被公认为顶级医疗保健组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/DUHS-recognized-as-top-health-care-organization-for-using-digital-health-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/DUHS-recognized-as-top-health-care-organization-for-using-digital-health-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22031714-44f7-41e1-b4ed-36ad6c08aa44 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:18:00 -0500
有节奏的言语，而不是语音，是婴儿语言学习的关键研究人员表示，父母应该尽快使用童谣等歌曲语言与婴儿说话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Rhythmic-speech-not-phonetics-key-to-language-learning-in-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Rhythmic-speech-not-phonetics-key-to-language-learning-in-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=352ae4fc-63f7-4d3a-945c-f56b655af7a8 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 11:10:00 -0500 Rhythmic speech, not phonetics, key to language learning in babies
德桑蒂斯-纽瑟姆的爆炸性辩论反映了国家的文化战争福克斯新闻将其正式命名为“伟大的红州与蓝州辩论”。但这场对峙很快演变成一场全面的政治争吵，双方是加州民主党州长加文·纽瑟姆(Gavin Newsom)，他没有竞选总统。佛罗里达州共和党州长罗恩·德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）在选民民意调查中现在和现在都没有超过前总统唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Explosive-Desantis-Newsom-debate-reflects-natione28099s-culture-wars.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Explosive-Desantis-Newsom-debate-reflects-natione28099s-culture-wars.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c503506a-f6af-46ea-a56f-f2b571db8cc7 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 09:57:13 -0500 Explosive Desantis-Newsom debate reflects nation’s culture wars
UKHSA 报告显示艾滋病毒传播持续下降，但存在不平等英国卫生安全局（UKHSA）发布了政府在减少艾滋病毒传播方面取得的进展的最新评估报告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/UKHSA-report-reveals-continuous-decline-in-HIV-transmission-but-inequalities-exist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/UKHSA-report-reveals-continuous-decline-in-HIV-transmission-but-inequalities-exist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fc4bb8c-d184-4403-bccc-7c45a18a6e4b Fri, 01 Dec 2023 09:54:16 -0500 UKHSA report reveals continuous decline in HIV transmission but inequalities exist
突破性研究表明索马鲁肽和替泽帕肽可以减少肥胖症患者的饮酒量索马鲁肽、替泽帕肽和胰高血糖素样肽 1 受体激动剂药物对饮酒的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Groundwriting-studies-indicate-Semaglutide-and-Tirzepatide-may-reduce-alcohol-conspiration-in-individuals-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231201/Groundwriting-studies-indicate-Semaglutide-and-Tirzepatide-may-reduce-alcohol-conspiration-in-individuals-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66c4e0a5-b2e4-4840-838c-ece0dc45ea76 Fri, 01 Dec 2023 09:31:00 -0500 Groundbreaking studies indicate Semaglutide and Tirzepatide may reduce alcohol consumption in individuals with obesity
